column5: Amazing pieces! These are my favorite characters. Collector’s pieces are great.
I had to buy this because I lost my other blasters. A little expensive and as hard. Didn’t improve my troopers’ aim either, but that is to be expected.

Five stars all the way! I’m a lifelong Star Wars fan and the level of detail on this figure is impeccable. With a dazzling black cape and smooth armor, this Darth Vader is sure to look great on any set.
I know inflation is bad, but why on this green earth is this character so expensive. Still bought it though.
